div.head: Calcutta Lyric Thetre.
(for the denefit of the "Indian Relief Fund")
div.p: The Amatures of H.M.S. "Chesapeake" will on Thrusday next, 25th February, perform the most admired, and highly romantic Drama of "The Seven Clerks", (a legend of Marseilles) to be followed by a "Nautical Hornpipe" &c, the whole to concluded with the laughable, Burlesque, Tragic Opera "Bombastes Furioso." The splendid Band of H.M.S. "Chesapeke" will attend under their talented Master, Juan Faustin
